content:
Diagnosis:	Advanced colon cancer, pT4aN2bM1, moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma.
			Metastatic disease to liver and lungs identified February 2023.

Treatment:		Right hemicolectomy April 2022 followed by adjuvant FOLFOX chemotherapy (12 cycles completed December 2022).
			Commenced palliative FOLFIRI with bevacizumab March 2023; ceased October 2023 due to disease progression.

Current:		Progressive disease noted on CT December 2023 with significant liver burden and new peritoneal metastases.
			Supportive care measures initiated January 2024.

I regret to inform that [redacted name] passed away on 10 February 2024 at home under palliative care services. Performance status had declined significantly to ECOG 4, and symptoms included worsening abdominal pain and profound fatigue. The immediate cause of death was presumed to be disease progression leading to multi-organ failure. Please do not hesitate to contact us if any additional information is required.
